title: Deputy PM Dar visits Jinnah Convention Center, reviews ongoing renovation work
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister Ishaq Dar visited the Jinnah Convention Center on Thursday to review the ongoing renovation work.
Chairman CDA Muhammad Ali Randhawa briefed the Deputy Prime Minister on the progress of the project, which aims to upgrade the center to international standards.
The renovation work, which is proceeding without interruption, seeks to enhance the centerâ€™s facilities and capabilities to host various international events in Islamabad.
Upon completion, the Jinnah Convention Center is expected to be an excellent venue for conferences, providing state-of-the-art facilities as per international standards.
Deputy Prime Minister Ishaq Dar expressed his satisfaction with the progress of the project and emphasized the importance of upgrading the center to meet global standards.
